scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css & npm run watch-test
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: NODE_ENV=production mkdir -p build/scripts && browserify -t babelify -t uglifyify src/client.js -o build/scripts/client.bundle.js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p build/styles && node-sass app/styles/ -o build/styles/ --output-style compressed -w
